changes.ğŸ”¥ New Features:
- **AI Temperature Control**: You can now set the randomness of AI talkbacks via `/settings generate temperature` (0.0 - 1.0). Default is 1.0.
- **Changelog History**: You can now look back at Roti's history with the new browsing buttons in `/changelog`!
changes.ğŸ› ï¸ Improvements:
- **Refactored Default Model**: The `/settings generate default_model` setting now ONLY applies to AI Talkbacks. The `/generate text` command will use the internal default (Gemini Fast) if no model is specified.
- **AI Talkback Logic**: AI Talkbacks now respect both your server's chosen model AND temperature setting.
changes.ğŸ› Bug Fixes: - Fixed issue where `/generate text` was incorrectly falling back to server default model instead of being independent.
